title: FS: 1900's Postcard? Not Sure Of Team 35.00

posts.post_title: FS: 1900's Postcard? Not Sure Of Team 35.00
posts.post_content:
I can't tell you the name of the team, the year, or if it's even an actual postcard. Maybe you can tell me. Anyway, the price is 35.00 PayPal friends/family please. Thank you for looking.

Joe K
